attributes.action: Wipe out all student/learning debt for all nurses, doctors and vital key workers
attributes.additional_details:
We owe these wonderful people our lives. They are bravely fighting covid-19 and putting themselves at risk, day after day. 

Why should we then expect them to still struggle day after day to pay off the training that was so vital to us in our moment of need?
attributes.background:
Covid-19 has highlighted how much everyone in the UK relies on our key workers. Doctors, nurses and others have put their lives on the line to help us. 

Let's repay them by wiping out any existing student/learning debts they may have.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310559

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
